raw_json.main_html:
R in the New York Times (updated)

Posted on January 8, 2009 by Paul Gribble in R bloggers | 0 Comments

[This article was first published on Motor Control Lab Blog » r-project, and kindly contributed to R-bloggers]. (You can report issue about the content on this page here)
Want to share your content on R-bloggers? click here if you have a blog, or here if you don't.

There’s an article in the New York Times about R: [ click here ] An excerpt from the article: To some people R is just the 18th letter of the alphabet. To others, it’s the rating on racy movies, a … Continue reading →

To leave a comment for the author, please follow the link and comment on their blog: Motor Control Lab Blog » r-project.
